overview: Gia Derza is excited to try on the new pair of jeans she ordered. After checking them out in the mirror, she discovers a big tear in the back of the jeans. Gia vents to her boyfriend, Michael Vegas, about the tear, but the unconventional style turns him on. While Gia is calling customer service, horny Michael takes the opportunity to show her the silver lining to ripped denim.
title: Put It in Her Ass 17
